name: this is fine (thunder-chickens)
description:
Gameplay

A real-life simulator, point-and-click adventure, from simpler times. You select groceries, speed up time with caffeine, and burn it all down  -- you know, the usual. 

Credits

Coder - Liam Atticus Clarke

Coder/Graphics - Nicolas M. Pardo

Graphics - Daria Anikanova 

Graphics - Ian Nastajus

Sound - Ally Ansari

Source Code:

https://github.com/LiamAttClarke/tojam-2020

Needs to be run with node server. Downloadable zip still needs be run with node.

Live Server

https://atticus.dev/tojam-2020/
